contest-event.event-date:
April 9, 1972 D NWABBA Contest (Second Section)
NWABBA Contest (Second Section) 20 Test Piece Contest NWABBA Contest north-west-association-contest-second-section
Own Choice from a Specified List
Four Corners of the World
Pembroke Halls, Worsley, Lancashire Prizes - 1st £35 and cup, 2nd £25 and cup, 3rd £15 and cup. Best cornet and horn - Goodshaw. Besdt euphonium and trombone - Lancashire Constabulary. Choice of Four Corners of the World (Hanmer) or Sinfonietta (Horovitz). 6 bands competed.
April 9, 2012, 11:44 a.m. May 18, 2016, 9:30 a.m.
1 Lancashire Constabulary Band Frank Hough
2 BMP (Europe) Goodshaw Band Herbert H. Howarth
3 Tyldesley Band Brian Peacock
Unknown Result British Vita Works Band John Harrison
Unknown Result Poulton-Le-Fylde Band G. G. Lloyd
Unknown Result Skelmersdale Prize Band William Lyon
